name: Artists.Views
desc: The views for associations between artists and other resources.

items.name: appears-on-albums
items.desc: A selection of albums from other artists this artist appears on.

items.name: compilation-albums
items.desc: Albums associated with the artist categorized as “compilations”.

items.name: featured-albums
items.desc: A collection of albums selected as featured for the artist.

items.name: featured-playlists
items.desc: Relevant playlists associated with the artist.

items.name: full-albums
items.desc: Full-release albums associated with the artist.

items.name: latest-release
items.desc: The latest release for the artist deemed to still be recent.

items.name: live-albums
items.desc: Albums associated with the artist categorized as live performances.

items.name: similar-artists
items.desc: Other artists similar to this artist.

items.name: singles
items.desc: Albums associated with the artist categorized as “singles”.

items.name: top-music-videos
items.desc: Relevant music videos associated with the artist.

items.name: top-songs
items.desc: Songs associated with the artist based on popularity in the current storefront.
